description: These sweet and savory chickpea veggie burgers are infused with smoky flavor and shredded bits of juicy apples. Enjoy them on a bagel or your choice of bun for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
name: Smoky Apple Sage Chickpea Veggie Burgers (or Breakfast Sandwiches)
recipeIngredient: 1-14 oz. can or 1 3/4 cups cooked chickpeas, (drained and rinsed)
1 medium apple, (peeled and shredded (choose a sweet variety such as Gala or Cortland)
6 burger buns, (bagels or English muffins, sliced open)
fresh greens, (such as baby spinach or arugula)

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas, panko, chickpea flour, onion, garlic, soy sauce, cider vingear, smoked paprika, rubbed sage, thyme, and black pepper into food processor bowl. Pulse until ingredients are well-mixed. Add shredded apple and pulse again just until mixed.
Transfer mixture to sealed container and chill 1 hour or overnight.
Preheat oven to 400Â° and line a baking sheet with parchment. Shape the chickpea mixture into 6 patties. Brush tops and bottoms with olive oil.
Bake 30 minutes, flipping about halfway through.
Stuff into buns, bagels or English muffins and top with toppings of choice. Serve.
